channel.title: Server name on top of server screen?
channel.description: How do i get it so the server name, time, and player ammount is on top of server screen? I searched everywere for this tut but couldn't find it!

u forgot to add the ; in there so it’d be writePlayers(); for pimpscape[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 05:08:24 AM[/size][hr]wait and how do i move it to like the side of the screen?

item.title: Server name on top of server screen?
item.dc:creator: @h3ro h3ro
item.description:
@h3ro wrote:

I think this is code, mines is under public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Note: I’m new to java so if it don’t work someone can tell you were to place.

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @red@Typername here", 6570); sendFrame126("@whi@Owner : owners name here", 6572); sendFrame126(" @gre@Players Online: " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

Credits go to eclipse245 for script btw.
